author: rustbeaver
content: Is the recording for this AMA available somewhere?

author: joshd4078
content: The AMA was rescheduled due to some unforeseen circumstances. We will post the rescheduled date as soon as we have locked it in.

author: mariohavel
content: <@&857649635274915900> Office Hours update - We are very sorry about the Tuesday AMA when Piper couldn't make it but we are rescheduling for hopefully later this month. Next two Office Hours calls will be dedicated to presenting your project proposals. It's a space to share your proposal with other fellows and also invite mentors to see and feedback your goals. Please aim for 10-15 minute presentation with some space for questions, we are hoping to have room for 3-4 people in this call. If you plan to present, please just leave comment under the issue  https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-four/issues/137

author: joshd4078
content: If we do end up having more than 3-4 people wanting to present per call, we will likely extend them to be 90 mins. It is highly encouraged for everyone to present their project in order to get feedback from mentors and your colleagues as well as practicing your ability to communicate your ideas to others.
